item.description:
It all comes down to one game. Let's watch and cheer on the Bruins as they try to bring the Stanley Cup back to Boston for the first time since 1972! 

Scoreboard has been packed all of the Bruins playoff season with capacity crowds. We were there for Games 5 and 6. They turned the Volume way UP!

It's a Wednesday night in the middle of June and we will be there for Game 7 of the Stanley Cup Finals at 7pm. All Natives, friends and guests are invited.

Game Time is 8pm. We will have a Reserved Table for 6 Natives near the Bar starting at 7pm thanks to Lauren from ScoreBoard. We need 6 people to be at ScoreBoard at 7pm to be seated. We will share the table with late arrivals throughout the evening. Please Indicate on your RSVP if you will be there at 7pm. 

Join us to be a part of history! 

Find out why this will be our last game watching meetup at this Scoreboard until...........................!

Show up and we will tell you why.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask For Lauren or E Mail Other RSVPs to coordinate
item.name: Watch Bruins vs Vancouver in Game 7 Stanley Cup Finals at ScoreBoard
